message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. It's a high-quality item worth more than $80 to me, and I'm confident it will be valuable to you as well. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I aim to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product to me for $90?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $95 for the product. This still reflects its value to me, while providing some flexibility within your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $92 for the product. This allows us to reach an agreement that respects both the value of the product to me and your budget constraints.
